    • Constructor Detail

      • Yellow

        public Yellow(int x,
              int y,
              int i_pos,
              int j_pos,
              processing.core.PImage[][] sprites,
              Map map)
        Constructor for Yellow Enemy
        Parameters:
        x - x position of the Yellow Enemy, amount of pixels to the right (for drawing)
        y - y position of the Yellow Enemy, amount of pixels downwards (for drawing)
        i_pos - the row within the map array where Yellow Enemy is located
        j_pos - the column within the map array where Yellow Enemy is located
        sprites - the sprite array, with each row corresponding to a sprite array for different movement directions
        map - the map object that the Yellow Enemy is placed within

    • Method Detail

      • collisionCondition

        public void collisionCondition(demolition.Direction d,
                               Map map)
        The recursive method that is executed upon collision with a wall. The Yellow enemy's direction is changed to the next clockwise direction, until GameObject.checkCollision(Direction d, Map map) is no longer true and there is no longer a collision.
        Specified by:
        collisionCondition in class GameObject
        Parameters:
        d - Cardinal direction in which GameObject is colliding in
        map - Map object which the GameObject is situated in
